# jupiterone_collector (Data Source)

Lookup a JupiterOne Collector by id.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the collector.

### Read-Only

- `account_id` (String)
- `collector_pool_id` (String)
- `created_at` (Number)
- `integration_instance_count` (Number)
- `last_heartbeat_at` (Number)
- `name` (String) The name of the collector.
- `state` (String)
- `updated_at` (Number)
